infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Theramate uses your location to find therapists near you.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Theramate uses your location to find therapists near you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Theramate needs camera access to take profile photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Theramate needs photo library access to select profile photos.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Theramate can add your appointments to your calendar.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Theramate to use your location to find nearby therapists.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Theramate to access your photos for your profile picture.

plugins.calendarPermission: Allow Theramate to add appointments to your calendar.
